# How to delete a presentation

This presentation is to show how to delete a presentation.

---
# Go to dashboard
Step 1 is to go to the dashboard.

---
# Click the three dots
Step 2 is to click the three dots.

---
# Select delete
Click on select delete from the menu that pops up

---
# Confirm (or cancel)
Confirm if you want to delete the presentation, otherwise cancel!
